metadata.title: CVE-2021-47168 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:NFS: fix an incorrect limit in filelayout_decode_layout()The "sizeof(struct nfs_fh)" is two bytes too large and could lead tomemory corruption.  It should be NFS_MAXFHSIZE because that's the sizeof the ->data[] buffer.I reversed the size of the arguments to put the variable on the left.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
